import * as React from 'react' import VisibilityOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/VisibilityOutlined' import ArrowForwardIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ArrowForward' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logoimage from '../images/logo.png' const Login = () => { return (

Welcome back

Log into your account

Login now

Not registered yet?{' '} Register {' '} {' '}

) } export default Login
